MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the FK2 postcode area of Falkirk. It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 12.40pm due to an underground cable fault and this may be affecting the supply to your property. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of difficulties connecting the generators on site and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1.26pm on Friday 23rd October 2020.
